    <section class="page-header">
      <h1 class="project-name">Metaheuristic.ai</h1>
      <h2 class="project-tagline">Framework for creating custom pipeline such as hyper-parameter optimization, autoML, batch processing and others.</h2>
      
        <a href="https://github.com/sergmain/metaheuristic" class="btn">View on GitHub</a>

    <section class="main-content">
      - [Index](#index)

how to:
    https://www.javadevjournal.com/spring-boot/spring-boot-application-as-a-service/

sources for winsw
    https://github.com/kohsuke/winsw

download .exe winsw
    https://github.com/kohsuke/winsw/releases

config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
          <service>
             <id>Aiai-service</id>
             <name>aiai</name>
             <description>Aiai Spring Boot as a service.</description>
             <executable>java</executable>
             <arguments>-XX:+PerfDisableSharedMem -XX:+AlwaysActAsServerClassMachine -Dhttps.protocols=TLSv1.2,SSLv3 -Xrs -Xms512m -Xmx512m -jar "%BASE%\git\apps\aiai\target\aiai.jar" --httpPort=8080</arguments>
             <logmode>rotate</logmode>
          </service>

      <footer class="site-footer">
        
          <span class="site-footer-owner"><a href="https://github.com/sergmain/metaheuristic">metaheuristic</a> is maintained by <a href="https://github.com/sergmain">sergmain</a>.</span>

      </footer>
    </section>
